url.zk:title: Writing Sparks
url.zk:content: Prompts for braving the blank page.

url.zk:title: At Ease, Soldier
url.zk:content: After decades of fractured identities, Bucky Barnes must confront his troubled past to reclaim himself and discover who he truly is.

url.zk:title: Break Yourself Against The Universe
url.zk:content: A lone survivor flees his ruined world, and with the unwanted help of his companion, he seeks redemption on a strange planet.

url.zk:title: Bridging The Worlds
url.zk:content: At the edge of a war-ravaged world, she and her brother flee through a haunted abyss, chased by shadows. Their only hope lies in the light beyond.

url.zk:title: Don't Show Her The Truth
url.zk:content: A deaf assassin finds unlikely companionship with a mysterious woman on a strange planet. Survival, secrets, and unexpected bonds unfold.

url.zk:title: Never Silence The Wild Heart
url.zk:content: On a harsh desert planet, a restless teen dreams of the stars. When a mysterious ship arrives, will it bring the escape he craves?

url.zk:title: No Good Options
url.zk:content: Loyalties clash as a reformed rebel faces an impossible choice. Destroy one last enemy or doom the universe. Seems simple, but there's a devastating catch.

url.zk:title: One Seed At A Time
url.zk:content: Post-apocalyptic hope blooms as a reluctant gardener cultivates survival. A tale of resilience, unlikely friendships, and humanity's rebirth.

url.zk:title: Our Undoing
url.zk:content: In a city of acid rain and broken dreams, a scarred survivor plots revenge against a criminal syndicate while yearning to escape to paradise.

url.zk:title: Poetry In The Stars
url.zk:content: A space-faring poet journeys through the seven galaxies, racing to capture fleeting moments in verse before her memories fade into the cosmic void.

url.zk:title: The Freedom Zenith
url.zk:content: A ruined battleship is found after a century, and two siblings want to restore her to glory: but ancient weapons and dark secrets lie dormant in her halls.

url.zk:title: Through The Universe Gate
url.zk:content: A struggling concept artist dreams of distant worlds while supporting seven kids. Will his constant wishing be his salvation or a cosmic trap?

url.zk:title: Why Are You Standing There?
url.zk:content: An ex-contractor, free from obligation, discovers they're not alone on a desolate world. But their mysterious savior may doom them both.

url.zk:title: Worshiping The Wired
url.zk:content: A custodian reflects on maintaining Teratechne's gleaming data centers, where artificial minds contemplate in twilight while pilgrims seek enlightenment.

url.zk:title: You Choose To Pull Through
url.zk:content: A bookshop owner discovers an injured winged woman on their isolated moon: a descendant of long-lost travelers whose arrival changes everything.

url.zk:title: Circular Maze Maker
url.zk:content: Create a circular maze and its solution.
